  • Method
com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api

Interface Service

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetricsService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceRegistryImpl

    public interface Service
    A self describing service. This interface implements a DSL for describing a service. It is inherently constrained in its use. A service can describe itself by defining an interface that extends this interface, and provides a default implementation for the descriptor() method.

    • Method Detail

      • descriptor

        Descriptor descriptor()
        Describe this service. The intended mechanism for implementing this is to provide it as a default implementation on an interface.

      • named

      • call

        static <Request,Response> Descriptor.Call<Request,Response> call(akka.japi.function.Creator<ServiceCall<Request,Response>> methodRef)

        Returns:
